sentences.sContent: It was almost impossible to pinpoint the cause of death.
...if you can pinpoint exactly what the anger is about.
sentences.sCn: …如果你能确切说明生气的原因。

synos.tran: 查明；精确地找到；准确描述
针尖；精确位置；极小之物

remMethod.val: pin(钉， 针) + point(点， 尖端) → 针尖 → 精确定位

trans.tranCn: 精确定位； 准确解释或确定
trans.tranOther: If you pinpoint the cause of something, you discover or explain the cause exactly
